title.rendered: iAmotus Bluetooth 5.0 Wireless Headphones 40H Playtime 3D Stereo Sound True Wireless Earphones Earbuds with Mic IPX7…

content.rendered:
iAmotus is dedicated to offering the right listening expertise, swimming within the ocean of music

Still worrying about headphone drops, sound high quality, pairing, and linking points? XY-7 new Bluetooth headset, resolve all of your troubles, present wonderful sound high quality, get pleasure from the great thing about opera

Supports iOS, Android, and Windows gadget connection. You solely want to verify that the gadget has Bluetooth operate to efficiently join. Compatible with Bluetooth 5.0 and under variations. The hyperlink is extra secure. The efficient connection distance is as much as 10 meters with out interference

Read more

Headphone utilization time

Playing time: 4 hours for one ear, 3-4 hours for each ears.

Standby time: 100H for one ear, 60H for each ears

Fully charged time: about 50 minutes for headphones and about 1 hour for charging compartment

Operation technique

Touch any headset to pause playback

Double-click on the left ear: Previous music

Double-click on the suitable ear: Next music

Triple-click on proper ear: Decrease quantity

Triple-Left Ear: Increase Volume

Touch the headset for three seconds to summon siri

Incoming name click on reply / dangle up

Touch the incoming name for two seconds to reject the decision.

Read more

Three totally different silicone ear caps to satisfy the wants of various auricles, not have to fret in regards to the measurement of the headset

IPX7 waterproof ranking, successfully stop mud, sports activities sweat, and luxuriate in your time

Quick connection, you may join the cellphone so long as you activate the cellphone, with out ready for the headset to robotically pair, decreasing ready time

Read more

Make positive this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
【Smart Touch, Convenient Operation】 Using contact management, no buttons are wanted, simply gently place your fingers on the headset to function, avoiding the tenderness of conventional button-type headsets when pressed. The operation is handy, and numerous features might be accomplished in accordance with the size of the contact time, comparable to altering the quantity, switching songs, making and receiving calls, and calling the voice assistant.
【Automatic Pairing, Master-Slave Conversion】After the preliminary pairing, take out the headset once more and activate the headset to robotically pair and join with out repeating operations. Put the headset again within the charging field, the headset will robotically disconnect and switch off, and robotically begin charging. The left and proper ears are the principle earphones.Each earphone can work independently, fully fixing the issue of frequent switching between single ear and binaural ears.
【Bluetooth 5.0, Stable Connection】High-fidelity sound high quality, tremendously enhancing compatibility and enjoying fluency, no voice delay, no interruption, no disconnection, cell gadget connection pace is quicker, and the sign is extra secure. It can be suitable with variations decrease than Bluetooth 5.0. The efficient connection distance is as much as 10 meters, free from interference from exterior elements.
【In-ear Design, Intelligent Noise Reduction】In-ear design, outfitted with 3 several types of earplugs, you may freely select the suitable measurement, long-time put on with out ache, and provides protected care to each ears. Intelligent noise discount know-how and microphone can acknowledge human voice and environmental noise, thereby decreasing noise and making the decision between the 2 events clearer.
【Smart Compatibility, Worry-free After-sales】Smart compatibility with mainstream Bluetooth units available on the market, and helps connection with iOS, Android, and Windows units. The capability of the charging compartment is 400mAh, and the headset can be utilized for 3-5 hours after being absolutely charged. We present VIP after-sales service to all clients. If you might have any questions in regards to the product, you may contact us to reply it for you.

excerpt.rendered:

【Automatic Pairing, Master-Slave Conversion】After the initial pairing, take out the headset again and turn on the headset to automatically pair and connect without repeating operations. The left and right ears are the main earphones.Each earphone can work independently, completely solving the problem of frequent switching between single ear and binaural ears.
